Brute Force.description: Workflow for repeated failed login or brute force alerts.

steps.name: Review Alert Details
steps.instructions: Summarize which accounts and IPs are involved in the brute force attempts.

steps.name: Check for Threat Intelligence
steps.instructions: Look up the source IP in threat intelligence databases (such as AbuseIPDB).

steps.name: Search for Successful Logins
outputs: any successful logins after brute force
steps.instructions: Check if the targeted account had any successful logins after the brute force attempts.

steps.name: Recommend Remediation
steps.instructions: Based on findings, decide if the attack was successful. Recommend user password reset, blocking IP, or further investigation.

Phishing.description: Workflow for phishing email or suspicious email link alerts.

steps.name: Extract Email Indicators
steps.instructions: List all suspicious elements in the email.

steps.name: Check URLs and Attachments
steps.instructions: Scan URLs and files in threat intelligence databases (such as VirusTotal or urlscan.io).

steps.name: User Activity Check
steps.instructions: Check if the recipient interacted with the suspicious email content.

steps.name: Recommend Remediation
steps.instructions: Advise on user notification, password reset, and blocking sender, depending on findings.
